> Anyways, have fun. Snowstorm's next step is to get it compiling, and 
we'll see where we go from there. Probably a bug-fix release or 
something. I'll write up a roadmap and post it on the project page 
sometime in the near future.

I have looked through some of the source code and couldn't believe how 
many files went into the game.
